testcase.name: Home page default login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User login into application with "user" and password "user"............passed And I click Submit..........................................................passed Then I see the message "Login successful"...................................passed

testcase.name: Failure login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User login into application with "bad-user" and password "bad-password".passed And I click Submit..........................................................passed Then I see the message "Invalid credentials"................................passed
